part_description: Three equally sized drawers, each with a centered knob, stacked vertically in a rectangular frame.
internal_interaction_description: Each drawer slides in and out of the main frame on tracks, allowing smooth operation. The knobs are attached to the drawer fronts, enabling easy pulling and pushing.
external_interaction_description: The chest can store items, interacting with users who open drawers to access contents. It stands on a flat surface and can be moved or repositioned as needed.
